name: Sniper Operation: Hight Shoote
description:
Sniper Operation: Hight Shooter has been on the line, this is a 3D FPS shooter. Game is not only the continuation of the process of stimulating a fierce battle, and the operation is simple and approachable.Accept the mission and find the best sniper point to take action to destroy all goals. A man, a war. Now you are cold killer. Protect your allies and innocent civilians, and destroy all the terrorists. Pick up your sniper rifle, aiming at the enemy's head, causing a fatal blow to the enemy.
Features:
• #1 FPS (First Person Shooter) game
• Ultra realistic 3d graphics
• Smooth game control.
• Efficient controls
• Amazing sound effects
• Single sniper war
